title: Midas Auto Repair Owner Mavis Tire Is Said to Pick Banks for IPO
description: Mavis Tire Express Services Corp., an auto repair and tire service provider that counts Midas and Tuffy among its brands, has picked banks for a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: Mavis Tire Express Services Corp., an auto repair and tire service provider that counts Midas and Tuffy among its brands, has picked banks for a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.
